AUTHOR: Alzarath
NAME: MAL
SHORT: Searches MyAnimeList for anime and manga
DESCRIPTION:
Usage: [p]anime [text...] to search for and display information about an anime
Usage: [p]manga [text...] to search for and display information about a manga

Usage: [p]malset [username|password] [text...] to set credentials for MyAnimeList

Searches http://myanimelist.net/ for an anime or manga.
